spec_data.Name: yum-cron-hourly
spec_data.Description:
This is the configuration file for the daily yum-cron update service, which
lives /etc/yum/yum-cron-hourly.conf.
Install this package if you want automatic yum metadata updates hourly via
cron (or something else, via. changing the configuration).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:54:36 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Files needed to run yum updates as an hourly cron job
